selectedVerses.text: for behold, the wicked bend the bow; they have fitted their arrow to the string to shoot in the dark at the upright in heart;
And he said to his boy, "Run and find the arrows that I shoot." As the boy ran, he shot an arrow beyond him.
"But you, O mountains of Israel, shall shoot forth your branches and yield your fruit to my people Israel, for they will soon come home.

When Ahaziah the king of Judah saw this, he fled in the direction of Beth-haggan. And Jehu pursued him and said, "Shoot him also." And they shot him in the chariot at the ascent of Gur, which is by Ibleam. And he fled to Megiddo and died there.
then, if the king's anger rises, and if he says to you, 'Why did you go so near the city to fight? Did you not know that they would shoot from the wall?
